name: Opening Knight
description:
A horde of goblins crash the opening night of the school play, and its up to you to save the day! Every 10 seconds the goblin king sends out more of his minions. How long can you last?

Controls:

WASD to move

Left click or J to attack

Tips:

Peasants are aggressive, but you outrange them by a lot, so fight them patiently

Wizards can be easily cornered after you weave through their fireballs

Spawners will drop on the 3rd, 9th and 15th waves and they spawn peasants every 10 seconds as well

Health potions will drop every 5th wave
